title: PA-17-01: Deadlines and Procedures for Annual Public Financial Disclosure Reports of Executive Branch Employees (2017 Filing Cycle)
summary: This program advisory announces deadlines for the public financial disclosure reports of executive branch employees and procedures for the public financial disclosure reports of executive branch employees whose reports agencies are required to transmit to the U.S. Office of Government Ethics. The deadlines and procedures apply to 2017 annual public financial disclosure reports that are due in May 2017 and cover calendar year 2016.
